participant_1.background:
I have always been close to my family, even though we are not always in agreement.
I try to walk with my cats every day, and I also do some yoga.
i work at a grocery store.
i always have a beer after work.
my favorite subject in school was science.

participant_2.background:
I am not a good swimmer, but I try my best.
I'm a loner who likes to spend time with my dog.
Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes.
I am passionate about making music and expressing myself through it.
I am grateful for my family's support, but I need to make some changes to my lifestyle.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to make music. I find it really therapeutic and a great way to express myself.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn an instrument, but I'm not very coordinated.
It's never too late to start! I took lessons when I was younger, but I really started to get into it when I was in college.
That's awesome. I'm glad you found something you're passionate about.
Thanks! I'm really grateful for the opportunity to share my music with others.
I'm sure you're great! What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different genres, but I'm mostly into indie rock and folk.
That's awesome! I love both of those genres.
Me too! I think they're both really expressive and unique.
I agree! I'm always looking for new music to listen to. Do you have any recommendations?
Sure! I'm really into this band called The Lumineers right now. They're a great indie folk band.
I'll have to check them out! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I hope you like them!
